attributes.action: Call For A Public Enquiry Into The Death Of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the appaling death of baby p we would like a public enquiry into how this can happen. Why arent the Haringey Social Services being punished after they let this happen to this little boy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
